title: Zombie-themed cruise for Walking Dead superfans set to launch in January

For a zombie apocalypse experience at sea, look no further than this one-of-a-kind cruise.
Setting sail in January 2016, Walking Dead fans will have the chance to take part in what sounds like a premise of a horror film itself: a zombie-themed voyage aboard the Norwegian Pearl.
The three-day escape will leave from Miami on January 15 and dock in Nassau, Bahamas on January 18.
Horror fans create zombie-themed 'Walking Dead' cruise From January 15-18, 2016, fans of The Walking Dead will descend on a themed voyage in the Caribbean
The entire thing is the brainchild of, and will be hosted by, The Walker Stalkers, who organise sci-fi and horror fan conventions around the world each year.
Fans will have the chance to vacation with some stars of the show, like Norman Reedus, Chandler Riggs, and Emily Kinney.
 Now that's a sight Tusi: Remains of ancient Chinese tribal... Starving orangutans saved from certain death by team of... Back by popular demand: Set sail on this revolutionary hot... Vacation like a VIP: Kristen Stewart, Britney Spears and... 16 shares Makeup artists will also be on hand to help holidaymakers transform into a member of the undead and costume contests, question and answer panels and theme nights have also been scheduled.
The ship's standard luxury amenities will also be available to all travellers, including several pools, hot tubs, a rock-climbing wall and even a bowling alley.
The three-day escape will leave from Miami, Florida and ultimately dock in Nassau, Bahamas
On board the Norwegian Pearl ship, enthusiasts will be able to partake in costume contests and theme nights
As part of the all-inclusive price, guests will also have access to all of the ship's luxury offerings
Pre-sale bookings are already open and the first 1,000 guests to sign up will receive a limited-edition lithograph
Several stars from the show will also be on hand for the cruise, including Norman Reedus and Chandler Riggs
Hosted by fan convention organisers, The Walker Stalkers, a promotional video has already been released to increase interest and awareness
All meals are complementary and will be included in the ticket price, which starts at $750 (or about Â£482) for a double occupancy.
The cruise is already accepting pre-sale bookings and the first 1,000 guests to sign up will receive a limited-edition lithograph signed by star Norman Reedus.
The entire floating convention can accommodate up to 2,200 fans in total.
